description: Drink a bellyshot from player that is next to you
Empty you friends glass while singing the Finnish national anthem
Dance a bellydance
Just drink your sips loser
Kiss a player who's the same sex as you are
Empty your drink NOW, you have 5 secs so HURRY!
Drink a cup of water
Make a Rule, which everyone has to follow, disobedience leads to a fee of 2 sips
Kiss a player who's the opposite sex as you are
Waterfall(Everyone drinks until the person next to them stops)
Everyone except you must finish their drink :(
Pick someone to drink with their opposite hand for the rest of the game
List car brands, the first loser drinks the bet
List shampoo brands, the first loser drinks the bet
Describe your first impression of a person on your right
Everybody changes their seats
No bad language by anybody, a sip for every swearword for the next 10mins
Call everyone in the game a bitch when you talk to them for the next 10mins
Finish your drink! :(
List tobacco brands, the first loser drinks the bet
The next person must take their turn sitting on your lap
Every time you give a sip, you take a sip for the next 10 mins
The tallest person at the table must take 4 drinks then give 4 drinks
The shortest person at the table must take 4 drinks then give 4 drinks
You must play the rest of the game wearing no socks
You can only talk to inanimate objects (not people) for the rest of the game
Give all players  a new name.  All players must use the new names, or drink 1 every time they fail.
Give 3 reasons why Trump is smarter than Putin or drink 4
You must compliment the person to your left
You must keep physical contact with the person to your right for the remainder of the game
You can only talk to inanimate objects (not people) for the rest of the game
The last person to switch their socks to their opposite feet drinks the bet
